name: Arrow Treasure
description:
Help Diana the treasure hunter find lost artifact in collapsing kingdom. Summoned by the legendary Archer King, she's tasked with finding his golden bow. On her way she will gather enchanted arrow tips that will help her overcome obstacles.

Entry for Metroidvania Month 19!

CONTROLS:

WASD/Left analog/Dpad - movement

Mouse/Right analog - aim

LMB/Right trigger - fire bow

Hold fire to summon yout arrows

Scroll wheel/Left and Right shoulder - change arrows

Spacebar/W/A button/Up on controller - jump

Esc/Select on controller - open arrow menu

In arrow menu, left/right change selected position, up/down change arrow type
